nodes.text: A wampa on the ice planet Hoth tried to attack Coruscant Jedi Academy students and teachers while on a field trip. Cronah thought the wampa was their physical education teacher Kitmum, but Roan realized that Kitmum wasn't on the field trip. Then, the wampa tried to attack them but then teachers Yoda and Garfield fought back and scared the wampa away.
